physical_appearance:\The image shows a digital print
 an artist\u0027s proof
 and a slide. They are rectangular in shape. Both the digital print and the artist\u0027s proof depict the backs of three women. All of them are wearing headscarfs and shoes. The background of the digital print and the artist\u0027s proof show a building. The first level of the building contains running rectangular patterns along its wall. There are numerous cracks along the concrete
 above the base of the building. The ground in which the three women are walking on contains numerous stones. It is also uneven. The image on the right shows a slide. It is black-and-white in colour. It is held in place by a frame. On the borders of the frame
 \\Three Worker\\ is stated at the top and \\Tan Lip Seng
